schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

step_run.description: Reference to analysis step run in pipeline
step_run.title: Analysis Step

___href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

quality_metric_of.description: One or more files that this metric either applies to or is calculated from.
quality_metric_of.title: Files

items.description: A particular file associated with this quality metric.
items.comment: See file.json for a list of available identifiers.
items.title: File

description: Schema for reporting the specific calculation of an quality metrics
title: fastqc quality metric

___Sequence length.description: The length of the shortest and longest sequence in the set. If all sequences are the same length only one value is reported
___Sequence length.title: Sequence length

___href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

___Per base sequence content.description: Warning if difference between A and T or G and C is greater than 10% at any position
___Per base sequence content.title: Per base sequence content flag

___Total Sequences.description: A count of the total number of sequences processed
___Total Sequences.title: Total sequences

___Sequences flagged as poor quality.description: Sequences flagged to be filtered and removed from all analyses in Casava mode.
___Sequences flagged as poor quality.title: # of poor quality sequences

___Per base sequence quality.description: Pass/fail and warning based on the per base sequence quality score thresholds set
___Per base sequence quality.title: Per base sequence quality flag
